MEMBERSHIP NEWS PRESS REQUEST E-MAGAZINE CONTACT 6 Photos That Tell the Story of Life Between the Fairways and the Sea Posted on: August 4, 2025 Read time: 4 minutes There’s something timeless about the story written along Florida’s Atlantic Coast. Few places rival the way morning light dances across the water, the softness of the breeze, and the ease of coastal living at its most authentic. Maybe that’s part of why Orchid Island feels like a hidden chapter. Tucked between the Atlantic Ocean and the Indian River Lagoon, this private club community offers a rare blend of natural serenity, world-class amenities, and the genuine warmth of a close-knit neighborhood. While words can hint at the serenity and connection found here, sometimes a photo says it best. These six scenes offer a glimpse into the beauty and everyday magic found at Orchid Island. 1. Morning Tees and Ocean Breezes Many Members choose to begin their day watching the soft sunlight stretch across the fairways of the Arnold Palmer-designed championship golf course . Designed to flow with the natural topography, the par 72 course offers an unforgettable experience for both avid golfers and those discovering the game for the first time. The gentle hum of the ocean isn’t far off, creating a tranquil backdrop for a morning round. 2. Florida Coast Architecture With Character Strolling through this private club community feels like stepping into a modern take on Old Florida charm. Across just 375 residences , West Indies-inspired architecture creates a cohesive yet varied sense of place – from oceanfront condominiums and estate homes to cozy cottages tucked along quiet cul-de-sacs. Homes are oriented to capture, water, golf, or garden views, blurring the lines between indoors and out. 3. Glide Into Nature’s Quiet Corners Life at Orchid Island moves to the rhythm of the tide. Kayak Cove places the Indian River Lagoon just steps from home, with a dedicated kayak launch. Each paddle through the winding waterways brings the chance to spot native birds in flight, or even glide past a manatee in the quiet shallows. 4. A Match for Every Mood Leisurely competitions are a favorite Member pastime at the Sports Complex . With six cushioned pickleball courts, eight Har-Tru tennis courts, and a shaded pavilion bar nearby, post-game conversation flows as easily as the play. Here, staying active feels as natural as the Florida coast breeze – whether it’s a round of croquet, a game of bocce, or a few shots on the basketball court. 5. Private Club Gatherings With Heart From sunset cocktails on the veranda to casually elegant dinners, life at the Beach Club is both vibrant and welcoming. It’s a place where generations come together, whether to lounge by the pool, unwind with a spa treatment, or share a meal seaside. The Club’s social calendar fosters meaningful connections, while attentive service makes Orchid Island feel like home for both longtime Members and new arrivals. 6. Moments That Make the Day As the sun dips below the horizon, Members retreat to more than a mile of secluded beach. Barefoot walks become a ritual, accompanied by the soft crash of waves and pelicans gliding just overhead. It’s the kind of moment that inspires reflection – a quiet gratitude for the natural beauty woven into everyday life. Explore A Rare Opportunity on the Florida Coast Every day at Orchid Island brings something to savor – an early morning round of golf, a peaceful afternoon on the water, or an evening shared over dinner with friends. It’s no surprise that this private club community is in high demand. With limited availability, the best way to stay informed about upcoming listings is to register your interest at OrchidIslandFL.com . To discover more about the surrounding area and community lifestyle, request a complimentary copy of Orchid Island Magazine online. To schedule a private tour of the Club and community, call 772.388.3888 . Receive Your Complimentary Magazine Please complete the form below to receive updates on our current and new communities. MEMBERSHIP NEWS PRESS REQUEST E-MAGAZINE CONTACT Meet The Orchid Island Realty Team As Orchid Island’s only on-site real estate firm, nobody understands this oceanfront golf community better than the team at Orchid Island Realty. From oceanfront, riverfront and golf course homes for sale to membership inquiries, our knowledgeable and friendly team has the insight needed to help you make an informed decision on your next home purchase. Meet the experts who are exclusively focused on homes and oceanfront condominiums for sale within Orchid Island. < ?php echo do_shortcode( '[abouts numperpage="50" category="meet-the-team" order="ASC" orderby="post_date"]' ); ?> Anne Torline Broker Anne has been a resident of the Sunshine State for over 20 years and has an extensive real estate background, which includes many country clubs and upscale communities. Her philosophy is simple - to be as knowledgeable and up-to-date as possible about the real estate business, to be available, to be ethical & honest, and to provide a superior client experience. In her leisure time, Anne enjoys biking, walking and spending time outdoors and absolutely loves living on the Treasure Coast. Her optimistic and cheerful attitude, along with her solid business background and vast network of contacts, make her a great asset to the Orchid Island Realty Team. Contact Anne Heidi Levy Broker Associate Heidi has been selling luxury properties in country club and golf communities from Palm Beach to Vero Beach for over 25 years. A resident of Vero Beach for close to 20 years, Heidi enjoys the island lifestyle along with her family and has been selling exclusively at Orchid Island for over 10 years. She focuses exclusively on serving the real estate needs of new and existing owners at Orchid Island. MEMBERSHIP NEWS PRESS REQUEST E-MAGAZINE CONTACT See How This Florida Golf Club Makes It Easy to “Paddle” By Land or Sea Posted on: June 10, 2025 Read time: 3 minutes Sunshine, calm waters, and the quiet rhythm of the coast. Florida’s barrier islands invite a lifestyle that moves with intention. At Orchid Island Golf & Beach Club near Vero Beach, Members enjoy the freedom to embrace it all. Situated between the Atlantic and the Indian River Lagoon, this private Florida golf club offers an elegant, understated escape that captures the best of coastal living. Here’s a look behind the gates at the relaxed lifestyle Members enjoy daily. Paddling Through Florida’s Wild Side The joy of paddling comes alive at Kayak Cove , the community’s private launch into the Indian River Lagoon. As North America’s most biologically diverse waterway, its ever-changing backdrop of salt and freshwater marshes, pine flatwoods, and hardwood hammocks makes every outing a serene escape. Members paddle through winding mangroves, pause to watch dolphins play, or spot herons and egrets along the shore. The Rhythm of Play on Land Members trade their oars for paddles at the new Sports Complex . Here, morning meetups and friendly matches are a part of the daily rhythm on the six pickleball courts and eight Har-Tru tennis courts. The state-of-the-art facility also features a shaded pavilion bar for post-game conversations. Whether shooting hoops at the basketball court, tossing bocce balls, or enjoying a game of croquet, staying active here feels effortless and social. A Golf Course That Breathes with Nature For Members seeking a place where nature and sport coexist, the Arnold Palmer–designed championship golf course offers the perfect escape. This impeccably manicured par-72 layout with nine tee options welcomes golfers of all levels to enjoy a relaxed, unhurried game. As an Audubon Certified sanctuary , the course winds through protected habitats, reflecting the calm beauty of nearby waterways. Sightings of white pelicans, roseate spoonbills, migratory birds, and other wildlife add a captivating touch to every round. Generational Joy Along the Coast Beyond the fairways, the Atlantic’s gentle waves and powdery white sands set the stage for Florida’s known coastal lifestyle. Members enjoy strolling the shore, paddleboarding, or simply soaking in the ocean breeze on nearly a mile of beach. The West Indies-inspired Beach Club boasts oceanfront dining, a seaside pool, and a full-service spa to create moments of connection across generations. It’s a favored spot for Members to enjoy endless hours of birdwatching and sea turtle spotting. Florida Golf, River, and Ocean Homes in High Demand Orchid Island boasts 375 residences , each featuring West Indies-inspired architecture and sweeping views of either the golf course or the water. Golf course homes and cottages are nestled on private cul-de-sacs and winding streets, preserving uninterrupted views of the lush fairways and sparkling lakes of the signature Arnold Palmer course. Oceanfront condominiums and estates offer spacious, light-filled living spaces with stunning Atlantic views, while riverfront homes provide expansive Indian River vistas, many with private docks. With demand for this highly sought-after Florida golf club at an all-time high, inventory is limited at Orchid Island. To stay updated on new real estate listings, register your interest at OrchidIslandFL.com . A complimentary copy of the Orchid Island Magazine is available online, showcasing the surrounding area and lifestyle of the community. Call 772.388.3888 for more information or to schedule a private community club tour. Receive Your Complimentary Magazine Please complete the form below to receive updates on our current and new communities. MEMBERSHIP NEWS PRESS REQUEST E-MAGAZINE CONTACT Orchid Island Golf & Beach Club Membership Golf Club Membership in Vero Beach Orchid Island Golf & Beach Club golf memberships are limited, ensuring uncrowded play even during peak season. Still, a golfer’s life at this premier Florida golf community stays pleasantly busy throughout the year. A full calendar of instruction by way of pro-taught clinics and tournament-style events ups your game and then tests it as you finesse it. Much-loved member social events and a weekly calendar of men’s, women’s and mixed teams make starting up new or renewing old friendships easygoing and fun. There are no strangers at Orchid Island, only friends you have not yet met. Membership Form First Name * Last Name * E-mail * ZipCode* * Phone Number How did you hear about us? MEMBERSHIP NEWS PRESS REQUEST E-MAGAZINE CONTACT Why More Empty Nesters Are Seeking Private Retreats on Florida’s Treasure Coast Posted on: June 27, 2025 Read time: 2 minutes After the kids are grown and the classroom days end, many parents ask: What’s next? For countless couples, the answer is found in trading hustle for harmony. They’re drawn to places where the sun lingers a little longer, the pace slows down, and life feels relaxed. It’s no surprise that private club communities along Florida’s coast are seeing growing interest from empty nesters seeking a new destination, where the days are filled with excitement. One where the kids and grandkids are compelled to visit in the future. Let’s explore what’s drawing interest to private club communities like Orchid Island , in Vero Beach. The Gentler Rhythm of Florida’s Coast Florida’s decades-long reputation as a vacation spot is evolving. Today, it’s become a year-round lifestyle choice where active routines thrive in quieter, more natural settings. Paddleboarding, kayaking, fishing, and nature walks are part of everyday life, with beaches and parks that encourage movement at any age. The flexibility to travel remains intact, too. Along the Treasure Coast, airports in Vero Beach, West Palm Beach, Fort Lauderdale, and Miami make it just as effortless to explore the world as it is to return to the sun. Beach Club Living at a Personal Pace For many empty nesters, private club communities offer the ideal balance of ease, connection, and comfort. Here, Florida’s outdoor lifestyle feels more personal—and more private. Wellness amenities remain flexible to suit any day’s pace, while thoughtfully curated social calendars create space for meaningful connections. When culinary excellence, attentive service, and effortless living come together, your home transforms into a private retreat. A Private Golf Retreat Between the Intracoastal and the Atlantic Ocean Among coastal Florida’s private clubs, few settings compare to Orchid Island. Situated between the Atlantic Ocean and the Indian River Lagoon, this private Florida club offers an elegant, understated escape that captures the best of coastal living. Mornings might begin on the Arnold Palmer-designed championship golf course , while afternoons invite time at the Sports Complex , a leisurely game of pickleball, or a quiet moment by the Beach Club’s oceanside pool. The genuine warmth of the community makes it feel unmistakably like home. Carefree Living in a Naturally Private Setting Orchid Island’s 375 residences naturally support the relaxed lifestyle so many empty nesters are seeking. The West Indies-inspired architecture not only defines the character of the neighborhood but also reflects a breezy, effortless spirit. From spacious oceanfront condominiums and estate homes overlooking the Atlantic to riverfront residences with private docks, every home is designed to bring the outdoors in. Even the cottages and golf course homes, nestled along quiet cul-de-sacs, offer a sense of privacy and connection to the natural surroundings. For those considering a second home or a full-time Florida move, summer is an ideal time to explore. The quieter season makes it easier to tour the Club, experience the amenities, and get a true sense of the lifestyle. Demand for private coastal communities remains high, and with limited inventory available, early exploration can make all the difference. To stay informed about new listings, visit OrchidIslandFL.com and request a complimentary copy of the Orchid Island Magazine , which highlights the community and surrounding area. For questions or to schedule a private tour, call 772.388.3888 . Receive Your Complimentary Magazine Please complete the form below to receive updates on our current and new communities.
